definitions.definition: a person who advocates or practices socialism.
examples: left-wing, progressive, leftist, labor, anti-corporate, antiglobalization; Moreradical, revolutionary, militant; communist; informallefty, red "the socialist movement"left-winger, leftist, progressive, progressivist; radical, revolutionary; communist, Marxist; informallefty, red "a well-known socialist"Moreradical, revolutionary, militant; communist; lefty, red the socialist movementleft-winger, leftist, progressive, progressivist; radical, revolutionary; communist, Marxist; lefty, red a well-known socialist

definitions.definition: adhering to or based on the principles of socialism.
